newsitem.title: USA: Electronic Arts, Activision favored by Benjamin.
newsitem.headline: Electronic Arts, Activision favored by Benjamin.

text.p: Electronic Arts Inc and Activision Inc are the two video game software stocks favored by Robertson, Stephens & Co, analyst Keith Benjamin said Monday.
Both companies manage the flow of hot-selling products well and have the reach to expand aggressively internationally, Benjamin said.
They also have plenty of games for personal computers that easily can be converted to run on Sony Corp's PlayStation video game console.
"Electronic Arts has the most portable products to the PlayStation and international markets," Benjamin said. Activision follows closely behind.
"Electronic Arts is my No. 1 pick," he said. "Buying the stock anywhere near 30 has been an intelligent thing to do."
